ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup spearmint leaves, coarsely chopped

cookingTips: Remove all green outer skin and pink flesh from the watermelon rind - use only the white part
Cut rind into 1-inch cubes for even cooking and texture
The candy is ready when rind becomes translucent and syrup reaches soft-ball stage (235-240°F)
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Coach the baker on this unusual preserved candy - explain how sugar syrup infused with herbs candies the watermelon rind, creating a chewy, jewel-like confection. Guide on proper texture testing without a thermometer if needed.
